items.sentence: I\'m getting sick and tired of all your complaints.
Tom is very methodical in the way he does his work.
Tom is, without question, the best man for the job.
Our dorm\'s heating system isn\'t working properly.
Tom told me that he doesn\'t want to work with you.
Tom told me that he won\'t come to school tomorrow.
If you don\'t leave, I\'m going to call the police.
Tom and his brother usually cut each other\'s hair.
Tom doesn\'t like the way his mother cuts his hair.
You didn\'t seem to understand what Tom was saying.
You don\'t need to understand everything right now.
It\'s amazing how much work still needs to be done.
It\'s dangerous to climb a mountain during a storm.
It\'s difficult for me to express myself in French.
It\'s more beautiful here than I expected it to be.
It\'s one of the most polluted cities in the world.
Let\'s approach the problem from a different angle.
Unfortunately, many people don\'t trust us anymore.
How do you know Tom didn\'t do what he says he did?
How long do you think it\'ll take to get to Boston?
She always fed her children before she fed her dog.
She regretted that she had not followed his advice.
She tried to lift the box, but found it impossible.
She tried to persuade him not to decline the offer.
There\'s no way I\'m going to leave you alone here.
How many Christmas cards did you receive last year?
How many Christmas presents did you give this year?
I want to clean the house before my parents return.
Tom and Mary went to Australia for their honeymoon.
Tom and Mary were about to leave when John arrived.
Tom and Mary were dancing, but not with each other.
Tom and Mary were sitting at a table in the corner.
I\'m hungry, so I\'m going to get something to eat.
Don\'t disappoint me the way you did the other day.
Mary got her boyfriend\'s name tattooed on her arm.
Mary is the only girl I\'ve ever been in love with.
I advise you not to borrow money from your friends.
We arrived at the station as the train was leaving.
I\'d like a chance to explain why I did what I did.
Tom said his parents allow him to do what he wants.
Tom doesn\'t know if Mary likes pumpkin pie or not.
Tom doesn\'t know where Mary usually goes shopping.
Tom doesn\'t like to talk about this kind of thing.
Tom doesn\'t really believe that nonsense, does he?
Tom doesn\'t understand what Mary is trying to say.
Tom works out at the gym two to three times a week.
Don\'t forget to tell Mary that she has to do that.
Tom answered all the questions that Mary asked him.
Tom appears to have achieved what he set out to do.
Those are the most expensive shoes I\'ve ever seen.
Tom and I haven\'t seen each other for a long time.
It\'s obvious Tom doesn\'t want to talk about this.
Let me know once you\'ve decided when you\'ll come.
I think it\'s time for me to make some new friends.
I\'m not saying that your answers are always wrong.
Tom was playing basketball with a group of friends.
Tom is watching the baseball game with his friends.
I\'m afraid we won\'t be able to help you tomorrow.
I got a video cassette recorder cheap at that shop.
I hate it when women say that all men are the same.
I have a reservation for three nights from tonight.
I have lots of friends I can talk things over with.
I have practiced piano every day for fifteen years.
I have to take a make up test in English next week.
I want to share this with my grandchildren one day.
I want you to go to your room and pack your things.
I want you to tell me what you really think of Tom.
I want you to write to me as soon as you get there.
I don\'t yet know how much it\'s all going to cost.
It\'s a good restaurant, but it\'s quite expensive.
It\'s a pity that Tom doesn\'t know how to do that.
It\'s a waste of time to study when you\'re sleepy.
I wanted you to understand what you\'re up against.
It wasn\'t Tom\'s first time to drive a sports car.
The busses are especially crowded during rush hour.
The chance that Tom will get arrested is very slim.
The couple carved their initials into the oak tree.
The doctor told me that I should lose a few pounds.
Tom should know better than to ask Mary for a loan.
Tom splashed Mary, and then Mary splashed him back.
Tom spread some strawberry jam on a slice of bread.
You know how to change it, you just don\'t want to.
Do you plan to spend your summer vacation with Tom?
Do you want to spend the rest of your life in jail?
It was in 1939 that the Second World War broke out.
The price is low, but the quality isn\'t very good.
There aren\'t enough chairs in the conference room.
I\'d like to sing a song for you that I just wrote.
Strangers close by are better than family far away.
No one is going to tell Tom that he can\'t do that.
I\'m not at liberty to tell you about the incident.
I\'m not the least bit worried about losing my job.
I\'m not tired at all. Tom did most of the driving.
I\'ve been playing tennis with Tom for a few years.
I\'ve been waiting here for Tom since this morning.
I\'ve heard that Tom is planning to move to Boston.
I\'ve made more than one stupid mistake in my life.
You\'re not the only one who\'s been asked to help.
You\'re the most interesting person I\'ve ever met.
You should read a lot of books while you\'re young.
